Page.Name: SettingsHeader
Page.Text: Check the checkbox beside an item to show it on the Bottom Bar.

Checkbox.Name: Set_ItemHoverSet
Checkbox.Tooltip: Will only function properly if bar is set to minimum height.

Page.Name: SetVdir
